idea-plugin.name: Simple CamelCase
idea-plugin.description:
Simple camel case converter


Simple CamelCase plugin contain idea native plugin 'Toggle Case'



demo:
CAMELCASE -> camelcase
camelcase -> CAMELCASE

camelCase -> CAMEL_CASE
CAMEL_CASE -> camel_case
camel_case -> camelCase
camel_camelCase_CASE -> CAMEL_CAMEL_CASE_CASE

default keymap:
windows -> ctrl + shift + U IOS -> command + shift + U


Other: Better to remove 'Toggle Case' shortcut or replace it.
Step: Settings -> keymaps -> search 'Toggle case' -> right click -> remove shortcut
idea-plugin.change-notes: Simple CamelCase plugin contain idea native plugin 'Toggle Case'
